name: Viscous Forest
description:
A box-push puzzle game, but with candies!... and you involuntarily pull them with you. Bring the candies to the creatures of the forest to reveal the exit.

Warning: Saves for this game are unstable in the browser version. (Guaranteed the saves will reset when we upload a new build of the game) If that's a biggie for you, a downloadable version of the game is provided!

This game was made for Weekly Game Jam (Week 177) with the theme "Sticky".

Controls

  • W, A, S, D - Move
  • R - Restart Level
  • Escape - Return to Level select screen

Credits

  • BlazingScore004 - Code, Concept, Music
  • EndMark_3 - Art, Theme
